summary: When her daughter Sara (Davalos) unexpectedly passes away, Natalie (Keaton) retreats to the summer home where she and Sara used to visit. Time with her best friends and some of Sara's friends help her deal with her loss.
cast: Diane Keaton|Tom Everett Scott|Alexa Davalos|Lauren German|Josh Hopkins|Chris Pine|Peter Riegert|Marnie Crossen|Myra McWethy|Roy Werner|Liam Lynch|Ron Christopher Jones|Emil Lin|Leonard Stone|Michael Hagiwara|Emi Canavan|Renee Lopez|Eric Urbiztondo|Erik Clabeaux|Brystal Geu|Spencer Geu|Stephanie Hass|Saki Miata|Race Owen|Farhang Pernoon|Nicholas Pratley|Lorenzo Rodriguez|Tisha Vaculin|Kaleti Williams
keywords: summer|playwright|car accident|mother daughter relationship|long brown hair
title: Surrender, Dorothy
